roleset.name: be of importance
roleset.note: MATTER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'matter' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. No comparison. (from matter.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: it support
example.text: Spreads will become so tight that it won't matter which market an investor chooses -- arbitrage will prevent him from gaining any temporary profit.

example.name: odd tracing
example.text: ``What *trace* really matters is the operating income of the divisions.
example.arg: What -> the operating income of the divisions

example.name: with Arg2
example.text: GATT membership will not matter to Donbas coal miners short of soap
example.arg: to Donbas coal miners short of soap

roleset.name: subject matter: not eventive, do not use. Select .YY

example.name: do not annotate. .YY.
example.text: These family matters caused the patient more anxiety.
